item.title: This land is my land
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Starting your own country is not something that’s particularly easy to do. For one thing, you have no idea if it’s going to work, plus you’re stuck having to figure out annoyingly complicated details like currency, how laws will be implemented, and how you’re going to defend your borders from jerks you don’t want on your land. Czech politician Vít Jedlicka, however, thinks he’s up to the task.
